name: Lemonade (Mark D. Rejhon)
overview: Another interpretation of the classic old school text based business management simulation Lemonade (or Lemonade Stand) This one was developed by Mark D. Rejhon and released into the public domain in 1986. The object is to become a millionaire. You start by selling bottle of lemonade and, if succeeding to make 10k, you proceed to the stock market where you can buy and sell shares to 18 companies.
